TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithSameDigest
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM (SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE a = b) t WHERE b = a

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($1, $0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, b], where=[=(a, b)]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithNonDeterministicExpr1
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, a1 FROM (SELECT a, random_udf(a) AS a1 FROM MyTable) t WHERE a1 > 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], a1=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], a1=[random_udf($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, a1], where=[>(a1, 10)]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, random_udf(a) AS a1]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithNonDeterministicExpr2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a FROM (SELECT a FROM MyTable) t WHERE random_udf(a) > 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(random_udf($0), 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a], where=[>(random_udf(a), 10)]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithNestedNonDeterministicExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT random_udf(a1) as a2 FROM (SELECT random_udf(a) as a1, b FROM MyTable) t WHERE b > 10

LogicalProject(a2=[random_udf($0)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[random_udf($0)], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[random_udf(random_udf(a)) AS a2], where=[>(b, 10)]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithTopMultiNonDeterministicExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT random_udf(a1) as a2, random_udf(a1) as a3 FROM (SELECT random_udf(a) as a1, b FROM MyTable) t WHERE b > 10

LogicalProject(a2=[random_udf($0)], a3=[random_udf($0)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[random_udf($0)], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[random_udf(a1) AS a2, random_udf(a1) AS a3]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[random_udf(a) AS a1, b], where=[>(b, 10)]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeTopFilterHasNonDeterministicExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM (SELECT a, random_udf(b) as b1, c FROM MyTable) t WHERE b1 > 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b1=[random_udf($1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c], where=[>(random_udf(b), 10)]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithBottomMultiNonDeterministicExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a1, b2 FROM (SELECT random_udf(a) as a1, random_udf(b) as b2, c FROM MyTable) t WHERE c > 10

LogicalProject(a1=[$0], b2=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(CAST($2):BIGINT, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[random_udf($0)], b2=[random_udf($1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[random_udf(a) AS a1, random_udf(b) AS b2], where=[>(CAST(c), 10:BIGINT)]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithBottomMultiNonDeterministicInConditionExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT c FROM (SELECT random_udf(a) as a1, random_udf(b) as b2, c FROM MyTable) t WHERE a1 > b2

LogicalProject(c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, $1)]) +- LogicalProject(a1=[random_udf($0)], b2=[random_udf($1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[c], where=[>(random_udf(a), random_udf(b))]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCalcMergeWithoutInnerNonDeterministicExpr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM (SELECT a, random_udf(a) as a1, c FROM MyTable) t WHERE c > 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(CAST($2):BIGINT, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], a1=[random_udf($0)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a, c], where=[>(CAST(c), 10:BIGINT)]) +- FlinkLogicalLegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])
